'''Dracaena Somnolenta Chapter''' is the [[Story Quest]] chapter for [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]].

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;1;Omnipresence Over Mortals;Reflections of Mortality|display=bullet|requirements=1}}

==Summary==
===Act I - Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing===
{{Main|Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing}}
{{Description|The curtain has fallen on the Vision Hunt Decree, and Kokomi invites you to return to Watatsumi Island and join their Victory Feast.<br>The post-war peace talks are coming soon, and yet rumors that are hard to verify are beginning to spread. Some plot is clearly afoot.<br>It is time to bear witness to Kokomi's resolve and the future of Watatsumi Island.}}
{{Transclude|Warriors' Dreams Like Spring Grass Renewing|Summary}}
